4.description: I'll give three stars today and in three months I'll revisit my review. The reason for the three stars is, My. Toes. Are. Throbbing. I've been getting pedicures for over 15 years, and not once have I had a nail technician say I have ingrown nails and then proceed to take it upon themselves to cut away at my nails. Now, I know my toe nails grow in a weird way. I've just never had it brought to my attention that it was due to ingrown nail problems. I just chalked it up to having different toe nails. After my nail tech took care of my feet, she proceeded to tell me that within three months time I'll begin to see a difference. I am more than willing to come back here in that allotted time frame and see how this goes. But, man do my toes hurt. She cut the nail in a weird angle and REALLY filed them down. I have little nubbins now . She did seem very confident though in the results. That's why I'm more than happy to come back and see how this goes. If everything goes well, I'll be updating my rating to 5 stars.My manicure however, 5 stars!

24.description: I'm a fan. The Nail loft is so clean and inviting. There's always music playing, there's never clutter, and it always smells good. You don't walk in and feel like you're choking on nail polish remover.The staff is wonderful. Not only are they quick and very talented but they are very nice and happy to talk to you. I learned all about where the woman who did my nails is from. It's super refreshing to be spoken to and not just worked on like a car. They offer so many services and have extensive colors for you to pick from. They're also so reasonable with their prices. Highly recommend!

6.description: I really wanted to love this place. It has a super cute decor, great, reasonable prices, and is in a good location for me. I've been getting pedis for, well, decades, and I was so underwhelmed with the service it was extremely disappointing. They got me in quickly on a walk-in, which was nice, but the water for the soak was cold. The woman who actually gave me a pedicure barely looked at me, and basically went as quickly as she possibly could. At one point I apologized for being ticklish as she pumiced my soles, and she didn't crack a smile or even acknowledge that I said anything. Getting my calves and feet massaged is always the best part of the pedi, and I look forward to it every time. But she spent less than a minute on each leg and foot, and put barely any lotion on at all (and I shaved just for the occasion!).   When it was done, which was pretty quickly, she ushered me over to the drying station and after I paid and tipped, never saw her again. So I sat there, waiting to get the oil on my toes and get wrapped up so I could put my boots back on. After 20 min, I did it myself, noticing that at least four other women also had to oil and wrap themselves after their services. As a result, my pedi was ruined by the time I got home. Bummer. Honestly, I wanted to love this place. But the service I had was NOT friendly or welcoming, and I will not be going back. I've had much better pedis in other locations in the city. Oh well.

22.description: I love a good no chip, but I have had some pretty bad ones. This little slice of heaven, however, was awesome! Nu did my nails and toes and it was such a pleasant experience! Plus, all the gals here are so fun and inviting!

15.description: I love a good no chip, but I have had some pretty bad ones. This little slice of heaven, however, was awesome! Nu did my nails and toes and it was such a pleasant experience! Plus, all the gals here are so fun and inviting!

7.description: BEST NAIL EXPERIENCE I HAVE EVER HAD! Love the atmosphere, owners, and the pricing (12 for a mani?!). By far the happiest, friendliest, and most engaging nail technicians I have ever interacted with. My daughters and I got manicures, including an absolutely pristine French, and an incredible lip wax that was so well done it didn't redden. Immediately told all of my Chicagoan friends & family.

8.description: This cute little salon used to be my ABSOLUTE GO-TO for a decently priced (and even cheaper if you pay in cash!) no chip manicure.  Their decor is unlike any other place I've been (in a good way-- super cute, shabby chic, comfortable, inviting) and the staff was always super friendly.  They could get a little busy, especially on weekends, but worth the wait (there's a Starbucks across the street, haha.) I was always a walk in. Parking is metered on the street but just outside the door and typically not to hard to find, or you could drive around the neighborhood for a free spot. Leaving out one star (and also the reason I don't really go anymore) because they only do 'natural' nail services (no acrylics) which is fine, just not totally full-service like some other nail salons in the area. Highly recommended if you're in the market for a wonderful no-chip or relaxing pedi!

30.description: Thanks to the Nail Loft!  I had been eagerly anticipating this opening as I've passed by a few times during their renovation and it looked so cute.  And cute it is - really clean and a total turn around from what was in the space before.  It's very bright and cheery with chandeliers and other cute touches.  The staff was super nice.  I was running by and totally sweaty and popped my head in to see if they were indeed open.  They were!  So, I let them know that I would be back in the afternoon to get a manicure.  They were so accommodating - even though I was sweaty and had no money or wallet on me, they told me to come on in and that I could come back later and pay.  WHAT?! Wow!  I said no, but didn't need much prodding.  So, I had a very relaxing manicure.  I sat for a bit afterwards to dry them, but then went home to grab some money so that I could go back and pay!  They seemed a smidge surprised that I returned (either so fast or at all!), but I did return.  Really great deal - $11 manicure if you pay with cash ($12 otherwise).  No neck/back massage (which I love typically), but really relaxing and friendly.  Clean and neat and a great spot!

3.description: What a great experience! Today was my first time in. The service was fabulous, the place is clean and cute, and they really took their time. My nails look perfect and It was better than manicures that I have paid an additional 20 dollars for. I highly recommend!

14.description: Very impressed with how thorough and patient they were with my pedicure. Was able to walk in on a Sunday afternoon with no appointment.  Very accommodating, and great massage chairs!
